Caption: Dr. Erhard Eppler addressing the audience at the Computer Inauguration Function. On the dais from left: Prof. S. Sampath, Prof. A. Ramachandran, Prof. K.T. Chandy (Chairman, Board of Governers), Mr. C. Subramaniam (Union Minister), Prof. K.A.V. Pandalai (Director)
Event: Special Convocation, Inauguration of Computer Centre
